My Vision

My goal is to become an Instructional Designer in higher education, focusing on the design and development of online/hybrid courses and assisting instructors in improving their teaching skills and experiences.

Ling Qian
Instructional Designer - Instructional Technologies Specialist - Graphic Designer

About Me

               

I worked as an instructional designer and a faculty member in higher education in the past eight years. After pursuing my second master's degree in Instructional Systems Technology at Indiana University Bloomington, I will continue to work in higher education.

I have extensive knowledge in Instructional Design, adult learning, and cutting-edge learning technologies. I would like to use my professional knowledge to help faculty improve their teaching through technology.Please feel free to contact me if you have any questions about my portfolio.
